about.hero.title: Rooted in heritage, rising together.
home.hero.title: Welcome to Ella Rises
home.hero.subtitle: Empowering women, building community, creating lasting change
home.mission.heading: Our Mission
home.mission.body: Ella Rises is dedicated to empowering women through education, community support, and meaningful programs that create lasting positive change in our community.
home.feature.education.title: Education
home.feature.education.body: Providing educational opportunities and resources to help women grow personally and professionally.
home.feature.community.title: Community
home.feature.community.body: Building a supportive network where women can connect, share experiences, and lift each other up.
home.feature.empowerment.title: Empowerment
home.feature.empowerment.body: Creating opportunities for women to develop skills, confidence, and leadership abilities.
home.events.heading: Upcoming Events
home.events.copy: Join us for workshops, support groups, and community events.
home.cta.heading: Ready to Get Involved?
home.cta.body: Whether you want to attend an event, volunteer, or support our mission, we'd love to have you join us.
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.lede: Tell us how you want to engage with Ella Rises and we‚Äôll get back to you.

events.list.title: Upcoming Events
events.list.copy: Join us for workshops, support groups, and community gatherings designed to empower and connect women in our community.
events.list.empty.title: No Upcoming Events
events.list.empty.copy: Check back soon for new events!

events.detail.loginMsg: You need to be logged in to sign up for events.
events.detail.registeredMsg: We look forward to seeing you there.
events.detail.registerMsg: Secure your spot by registering now. You'll receive confirmation and reminders via email.
programs.list.title: Our Programs
programs.list.copy: Ongoing programs designed to empower and inspire young women
programs.list.empty.title: No Programs Available
programs.list.empty.copy: Check back soon for new programs!
programs.detail.join.copy: Enroll in this program to begin your journey with Ella Rises.

programs.detail.enrolled.copy: We're excited to have you join us.

programs.detail.support.title: Support This Program
programs.detail.support.copy: Your donation helps us provide quality programs and expand opportunities for young women in our community.
programs.detail.message.already: You're already enrolled in this program.
programs.detail.message.error: There was an error processing your enrollment. Please try again.

user.dashboard.overview: Here's an overview of your activity with Ella Rises.

user.milestones.copy: Track your achievements and celebrate your progress!
user.milestones.titleHint: (e.g., "BS in Computer Science from BYU", "Summer 2024 Software Engineer Intern at Google")
